00037 /**
00038  * Abstract class for the TCA field object classes
00039  *
00040  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00041  * @version     1.0
00042  * @package     TYPO3
00043  * @subpackage  oop
00044  */
00045 abstract class tx_oop_Tca_Field
00046 {
00047     /**
00048      * The type of the field
00049      */
00050     protected $_fieldType     = '';
00051     
00052     /**
00053      * The TCA table object in which the current field is registered
00054      */
00055     protected $_table         = NULL;
00056     
00057     /**
00058      * The name of the field
00059      */
00060     protected $_name          = '';
00061     
00062     /**
00063      * The instance (table) name
00064      */
00065     private $_tableName       = '';
00066     
00067     /**
00068      * The extension key
00069      */
00070     private $_extKey          = '';
00071     
00072     /**
00073      * The upload directory
00074      */
00075     private $_uploadDirectory = '';
00076     
00077     /**
00078      * The properties of the field
00079      */
00080     protected $_properties    = array();
00081     
00082     /**
00083      * The properties of config section of the field
00084      */
00085     protected $_config        = array();
00086     
00087     /**
00088      * Class constructor
00089      * 
00090      * @param   tx_oop_Tca_Table    The TCA table object in which the current field is registered
00091      * @param   string              The field name
00092      */
00093     public function __construct( tx_oop_Tca_Table $table, $name )
00094     {
00095         // Stores the TCA table object
00096         $this->_table                   = $table;
00097         
00098         // Stores the field name
00099         $this->_name                    = ( string )$name;
00100         
00101         $this->_extKey                  = $this->_table->getExtensionKey();
00102         
00103         $this->_tableName               = $this->_table->getTableName();
00104         
00105         $this->_uploadDirectory         = t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey ) );
00106         
00107         // Field can be excluded by default
00108         $this->_properties[ 'exclude' ] = true;
00109         
00110         // Field label
00111         $this->_properties[ 'label' ]   = 'LLL:EXT:'
00112                                         . $this->_extKey
00113                                         . '/lang/'
00114                                         . $this->_tableName
00115                                         . '.xml:'
00116                                         . $this->_name;
00117     }
00118     
00119     /**
00120      * 
00121      */
00122     public function __get( $name )
00123     {
00124         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00125             
00126             case 'label':
00127             case 'exclude':
00128             case 'l10n_mode':
00129             case 'l10n_display':
00130             case 'l10n_cat':
00131             case 'displayCond':
00132             case 'defaultExtras':
00133                 
00134                 return ( isset( $this->_properties[ $name ] ) ) ? $this->_properties[ $name ] : false;
00135                 break;
00136                 
00137             default:
00138                 
00139                 return ( isset( $this->_config[ $name ] ) ) ? $this->_config[ $name ] : false;
00140                 break;
00141         }
00142     }
00143     
00144     /**
00145      * 
00146      */
00147     public function __set( $name, $value )
00148     {
00149         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00150             
00151             case 'label':
00152             case 'exclude':
00153             case 'l10n_mode':
00154             case 'l10n_display':
00155             case 'l10n_cat':
00156             case 'displayCond':
00157             case 'defaultExtras':
00158                 
00159                 $this->_properties[ $name ] = ( string )$value;
00160                 break;
00161                 
00162             default:
00163                 
00164                 $this->_config[ $name ] = $value;
00165                 break;
00166         }
00167     }
00168     
00169     /**
00170      * 
00171      */
00172     public function __isset( $name )
00173     {
00174         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00175             
00176             case 'label':
00177             case 'exclude':
00178             case 'l10n_mode':
00179             case 'l10n_display':
00180             case 'l10n_cat':
00181             case 'displayCond':
00182             case 'defaultExtras':
00183                 
00184                 return isset( $this->_properties[ $name ] );
00185                 
00186             default:
00187                 
00188                 return isset( $this->_config[ $name ] );
00189                 break;
00190         }
00191     }
00192     
00193     /**
00194      * 
00195      */
00196     public function __unset( $name )
00197     {
00198         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00199             
00200             case 'label':
00201             case 'exclude':
00202             case 'l10n_mode':
00203             case 'l10n_display':
00204             case 'l10n_cat':
00205             case 'displayCond':
00206             case 'defaultExtras':
00207                 
00208                 unset( $this->_properties[ $name ] );
00209                 
00210             default:
00211                 
00212                 unset( $this->_config[ $name ] );
00213                 break;
00214         }
00215     }
00216     
00217     /**
00218      * 
00219      */
00220     public function toArray()
00221     {
00222         $field = array();
00223         
00224         foreach( $this->_properties as $propName => $propValue ) {
00225             
00226             $field[ $propName ] = $propValue;
00227         } 
00228         
00229         $field[ 'config' ] = array();
00230         
00231         foreach( $this->_config as $propName => $propValue ) {
00232             
00233             $field[ 'config' ][ $propName ] = $propValue;
00234         }
00235         
00236         $field[ 'config' ][ 'type' ] = $this->_fieldType;
00237         
00238         return $field;
00239     }
00240 }
